text:
Company: Combs-Roberts  
Role: Unit Manager  

Company Background:  
Combs-Roberts is a leading provider in the healthcare industry, renowned for our commitment to quality and innovation. Our mission is to deliver exceptional healthcare services while fostering a supportive and inclusive work environment.

Job Type: Full-time  

Job Description:  
We are seeking a dedicated Unit Manager to lead our dynamic healthcare team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of excellence in managing healthcare units and demonstrate unwavering commitment to our organizational values.

Responsibilities:  
- Oversee day-to-day operations of the healthcare unit.
- Ensure compliance with healthcare regulations and standards.
- Lead and mentor staff, fostering a positive work environment.
- Develop and implement unit policies.
- Collaborate with other departments to enhance patient care services.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:  
- Bachelor's degree in Healthcare Management or related field.
- At least 5 years of experience in a managerial role within the healthcare sector.
- Excellent leadership and organizational skills.
- Strong communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Commitment to upholding our core values.

Perks and Benefits:  
- Comprehensive health insurance plans.
- Retirement savings options.
- Professional development opportunities.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from USD 70,000 to USD 100,000, based on your experience and skills.
- New mothers are entitled to our maternity leave programme.

Application Instructions:  
Please submit his/her resume for consideration. His/her contributions will be crucial to our success. The ideal candidate will show his/her commitment to our values.
